
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y << endl
#define N 100005

using namespace std;

int a[N];

int main(){

	int tc = 0;
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	
	while(tc--){
		
		int n, total = 0;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
			
			scanf("%d", &a[i]);
			total += a[i];
		}
			
		if((total - n * (n - 1)/2)%n != 0)puts("-1");
		else{
			
			int ans = 0, x = (total - n * (n - 1)/2)/n;
	
			for(int i = 0, j = x; i < n; i++, j++)
				if(a[i] > j)ans += a[i] - j;
			
			printf("%d\n", ans);
			
		}
		
	}
}
